description: Comprehensive monitoring dashboard for Istio Service Mesh using OTLP metrics. Tracks request traffic, latency, error rates, control plane health, data plane proxy metrics, and security posture including mTLS and authorization policies.
name: istio-service-mesh
title: Istio Service Mesh Monitoring

f0ebb222-d50b-4667-9236-320d3bb02bcf.name: deployment.environment
f0ebb222-d50b-4667-9236-320d3bb02bcf.queryValue:
SELECT JSONExtractString(labels, 'deployment.environment') AS `deployment.environment`
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4_1day
WHERE metric_name = 'istio_requests_total'
AND unix_milli >= {{.start_timestamp}}
AND unix_milli < {{.end_timestamp}}
GROUP BY `deployment.environment`
ORDER BY `deployment.environment` ASC

9b3d757d-dce5-48f9-8cba-2ee5a415112a.name: service.name
9b3d757d-dce5-48f9-8cba-2ee5a415112a.queryValue:
SELECT JSONExtractString(labels, 'service.name') AS `service.name`
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4_1day
WHERE metric_name = 'istio_requests_total'
AND unix_milli >= {{.start_timestamp}}
AND unix_milli < {{.end_timestamp}}
GROUP BY `service.name`
ORDER BY `service.name` ASC

46f7f0b1-a9c7-46a6-9320-8eab32ee2363.name: namespace
46f7f0b1-a9c7-46a6-9320-8eab32ee2363.queryValue:
SELECT JSONExtractString(labels, 'namespace') AS `namespace`
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4_1day
WHERE metric_name = 'istio_requests_total'
AND unix_milli >= {{.start_timestamp}}
AND unix_milli < {{.end_timestamp}}
GROUP BY `namespace`
ORDER BY `namespace` ASC

57110e48-d041-467a-a0df-2a603b94c594.name: cluster
57110e48-d041-467a-a0df-2a603b94c594.queryValue:
SELECT JSONExtractString(labels, 'cluster') AS `cluster`
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4_1day
WHERE metric_name = 'istio_requests_total'
AND unix_milli >= {{.start_timestamp}}
AND unix_milli < {{.end_timestamp}}
GROUP BY `cluster`
ORDER BY `cluster` ASC

widgets.description: Total number of requests processed by the Istio service mesh
widgets.title: Total Requests

widgets.description: Rate of requests per second across the service mesh
widgets.title: Request Rate

widgets.description: Average request duration across all services in milliseconds
widgets.title: Average Latency

widgets.description: Rate of 5xx error responses across the service mesh
widgets.title: Error Rate

widgets.description: Request distribution across destination workloads showing traffic routing patterns
widgets.title: Request Distribution

widgets.description: Active upstream connections per cluster showing load distribution across backends
widgets.title: Load Balancing Efficiency

widgets.description: Upstream connection rate indicating circuit breaker activation and connection churn
widgets.title: Circuit Breaker Events

widgets.description: Envoy proxy retry and timeout counts indicating service reliability issues
widgets.title: Retries and Timeouts

widgets.description: Request duration histogram showing p50, p90, p99 latency distribution
widgets.title: Request Latency Percentiles

widgets.description: Request and response bytes per second showing overall service mesh throughput
widgets.title: Throughput

widgets.description: Average request duration per destination workload for identifying slow services

widgets.description: Request rate per source workload showing which services generate the most traffic

widgets.description: Rate of HTTP 4xx and 5xx responses grouped by response code
widgets.title: HTTP Error Rates

widgets.description: Rate of failed gRPC requests filtered by gRPC protocol
widgets.title: gRPC Error Rates

widgets.description: Rate of 5xx error responses grouped by destination workload
widgets.title: Failed Requests by Service

widgets.description: TCP connection closure rate which may indicate TLS handshake failures or connection resets
widgets.title: TLS Handshake Failures

widgets.description: Total memory allocated by Envoy proxy instances across the mesh
widgets.title: Envoy Memory Allocated

widgets.description: Envoy proxy memory allocation trend per service
widgets.title: Envoy Memory Over Time

widgets.description: Rate of TCP bytes sent across services indicating outbound network utilization
widgets.title: TCP Bytes Sent

widgets.description: Rate of TCP bytes received across services indicating inbound network utilization
widgets.title: TCP Bytes Received

widgets.description: Rate of Pilot xDS configuration pushes to proxy sidecars
widgets.title: Pilot Configuration Syncs

widgets.description: Time for proxy configuration to converge after Pilot pushes (p50/p99)
widgets.title: Config Convergence Time

widgets.description: Rate of successful Galley configuration validations
widgets.title: Galley Validations Passed

widgets.description: Rate of certificate signing requests processed by Citadel for mTLS
widgets.title: Citadel Certificate Issuance

widgets.description: Active upstream connections per service showing Envoy proxy load
widgets.title: Envoy Proxy Connections

widgets.description: TCP bytes sent and received rates showing bidirectional data plane traffic
widgets.title: Inbound/Outbound Traffic

widgets.description: Envoy sidecar proxy memory allocation trend across services
widgets.title: Proxy Memory Usage

widgets.description: TCP connection closure rate and retry rate indicating proxy connection issues
widgets.title: Connection Errors

widgets.description: TCP connections opened over time indicating mTLS connection establishment patterns
widgets.title: Mutual TLS Usage

widgets.description: Request rate of 403 Forbidden responses showing authorization policy denials
widgets.title: Authorization Policy Enforcement

widgets.title: Certificate Signing Requests

widgets.description: Rate of requests resulting in 401/403 responses indicating potential security policy violations
widgets.title: Security Policy Violations
